vocab.meaning: Arousing or deserving respect and approval
Inspiring great affection or delight
Friendly, good-natured, or easy to talk to
Readily feeling or showing fondness or tenderness
Agreeing with or consenting to a statement or request
Showing a disinterested and selfless concern for the well-being of others; unselfish
Causing great surprise or wonder; astonishing
Having or showing a strong desire and determination to succeed
Having or displaying a friendly and pleasant manner
Attractive or interesting
Feeling or showing gratitude or pleasure
Suitable or proper in the circumstances
Showing or feeling approval of someone or something
Having or revealing natural creative skill
Pleasing or appealing to the senses
Directing one's hopes or ambitions towards becoming a specified type of person
Having or showing a confident and forceful personality
Of undisputed origin and not a copy; genuine
Able to be trusted as being accurate or true; reliable
Seeming difficult to deal with in prospect; intimidating
Extremely impressive or daunting; inspiring awe
Keeping or showing a balance; in good proportions
Able to be believed; credible
(Of a person) generous or doing good
Well meaning and kindly
Gentle and kind
(Of a person) Enchant and delight
Extremely happy; full of joy
(Of a person, action, or idea) showing a willingness to take risks; confident and courageous
Exceptionally clever or talented; (Of light or colour) very bright;
Tolerant or liberal in one's views and reactions; not easily offended
Capable of attracting and holding interest; charming
Displaying kindness and concern for others
Exercising a compelling charm which inspires devotion in others
Relating to the assistance of those in need
Noticeably happy and optimistic
Alert and thinking logically and coherently
(Of an argument, theory, or policy) logical and consistent; (Of a person) able to speak clearly and logically
Feeling or showing sympathy and concern for others
Having the necessary ability, knowledge, or skill to do something successfully
Evoking interest, attention, or admiration in a powerfully irresistible way
Giving a lot of information clearly and in a few words; brief but comprehensive
Feeling or showing confidence in oneself or one's abilities or qualities
(Of a person) pleasing or liked on account of having qualities or interests that are similar to one's own; (Of a thing) pleasant or agreeable because suited to oneâ€™s taste or inclination
Careful not to inconvenience or harm others
Capable of causing someone to believe that something is true or real
Warm and friendly
Not deterred by danger or pain; brave
